name: Protector Shade
desc:
Unit is more likely to be targeted by enemies if unit is within 3 spaces of any Lord ally.
+8 STR, SKL, SPD if unit is within 5 spaces of any unit ally.
components: ([unitx for unitx in game.get_all_units() if 'Lord' in unitx.tags and unitx.nid is not unit.nid and utils.calculate_distance(unit.position,unitx.position) <= 3])
